TEXT.S:
Swaziland
u Swaziland sa i labu nu Africa (Fey-cuo ), itiza i 26 30 S, 31 30 E.u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 17.364 km2.u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 17,204 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 160 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 1,451,428. kakalukan umah sa 68.30%, kilakilangan umah sa 31.70%, zumaay henay umah sa 0%.
kiwkay nu Eswatininamisumad tu ku kanatalay a ngangan u "Swaziland" tu Se-waw-ti-ni wan-kuo (, Kingdom of Eswatini). u Se-waw-ti-ni ku cacay a Afric (Fey-cuo ) saadidi'ay nu kanatal. 110 Se-wati-ni Kingdom of Eswatiniidai i Afric (Fey-cuo ) nu walian timulan, amis, nutipan, timulan tulu a lilisan malaup nu South Africa, walian atu Muosan-pikemababiyaw, tademaw kya cacay a lasubu cacay a bataan (110) a mang, atu Na-faSouth Africamasasungaay ku sasiwbayan nuheni. 1530 Se-wati-nicacay ku acawa nu tatama pina ku tataynaan a acawawan nu lalid nuheni. Kuo-wannai' ku wantan tu demiad amipili'tu tatayna a kawawan, ayda nina kuowan sabaw tu lima (15) ku tataynaan a acawaw atu tulu a bataan (30) ku wawaw.[1]
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Mbabane.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 6 bulad 9 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung) ayza sa ci Mswati III, micakat a demiad sa i 1986 a mihca 4 bulad 25 demiad. u cunli nu Swazilandayza sa ci Themba N. Masuku, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 12 bulad 13 demiad.
laylay1618Mswazi"" Se-watia tademaw naw Pantua binacadan, cacay a bataan idaw ku enem (16) a seci nu Pantua binacadan namakayda i Africa (Fey-cuo ) nu tebang mabulaw tayda i nu timulan, sabaw tu walu (18) a seci, Sewa-cilanmiliyas tu Pantua patideng, u sakakaay ci N-sewa-ci Mswazi, nikudan a binacadan u Swatihan a binacadan. 19021968961973419782005 cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu idaw ku tusa (1902) a mihcaan nikudan ni kalepacawan nu Bu-Er, Se-waci-lanmala Ingkuomasimaway a kanatal. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku walu (1968) a mihcaan siwa a bulat enem a demiad misiteked. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku tulu (1973) a mihcaan sepat a bulad misiteked sepat a balad, Suopu-caese milawpes tu sinfa bulasakan ku ehun, pasaluimeng ku kawaw nu centan. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku walu a mihcaan misa baluhay tu sinfa, caay sipasiydai tu katuuday amihapu, katukuh tu tusa (1978) misabaluhay tu sian-facaay pihapu tu tademaw, katukuh tu tusa a malebut idaw ku lima (2005) a mihcaan misa baluhay tu sian-fa.[2]
sumad sa tu kanatalay a ngangan2018(Swaziland)Kingdom of Eswatini"" tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (2018) a mihcaan Sewa-cilankuo-wan ci En-se-waw-ti san sekumihapuay tu Sewa-cilanmisumad tu ngangan u Kingdom of Eswatini) , kalecad nu baluhay a kanatal nu sakalecad misumad tu tu "Sewa-tini wan-kuo". 41950(H.M. King Mswati III)50"""""Kingdom of Eswatini" Sewa-cilani sepat a bulad sabaw tu siwa a demiad patideng tunipi siteked tu lima a pulu atu kuo-wan ci En-se-waw-ti sakatuluay a se ( H.M. King Mswati III) tu lima a pulu anilecuhan maleapi ku kawaw, ci En-se-waw-ti sakatuluay a setini kasikawawan sakamusa Swazilandu UK (Ing-kuo ) anipanganganan a kanatal. mihapu sa pangangan tu kanatal han u "Kingdom of Eswatini". 5050Kingdom of Eswatini tawya sakamusa ci En-se-waw-ti sakatuluay a se, tada mautang tu misumad tu nganga saci Swaziland, makaadih tu duma a kanatal ni pisiteked, unu niyadu'ay tu kusapangangan tu ngangan nu kanatal, sisa, mangalay cinida itini i lima a bataan , lima a bataan nu likisian, mangalay misumad tu ngangan nu kanatal u Kingdom of Eswatini han.[3] eSwatini Swazilandu ngangan inai tahekal i dadiw. i Swazilandsakatahekal nu mibunsiw idaw ku igu atu faiun a ngangan nu kanatal, nika i sasa idaw ku baluhay a ngangan u E-Swa-tini (eSwatini), amica kunika adidi' nu sulit, saka tahekal nu mibunsiw acaay tu kasumad. BechuanalandBotswanaRhodesiaZimbabweNyasalandMalawi Africa (Fey-cuo ) timulan a nutaw a kanatal miliyas tu mabulaway a kitidaan misiteked satu misumad tu ngangan, mahida u Pacun-nalan (Bechuanaland ) sumadeng tu Puoca- na-kunhekuo (Botswana )Luode-siya (Rhodesia ) mala Sinpa-wi-kunhekuo (Zimbabwe )Niya-salan (Nyasaland ) masumad tu Ma-lawi-kunhekuo (Malawi). SwazilandSwitzerlandKingdom of eSwatini Swazilandkuo-wan ci En-se-waw-ti sakatuluay a sesakamu sa ayda, matalaw acaay ka tinengi nutaw ku Swazilandatu Switzerlandu nganga nu kanatal samad han tu Kingdom of eSwatini.[4]
lalangawan atu limulakUmhlanga, Reed DanceLudzidzini Sekuotu mihmihcaan idaw ku tusaay a angangan nu lalangawan nu lisin a kawaw, cacay han u penen a lisinan "Umhlanga" (Reed Dance, ), Sekuoa limucedan tu mihcaan nu walu a bulad atu siwa a bulat mapulung i "Ludzidzini" wan-kuna putah, tusaay a demiad i putah mudadiw malimulak. Incwala, the First Fruit FestivalLudzidzini duma u lalikid nu tatamaan a limulak "Incwala" (the First Fruit Festival) , tu paymihcaan sabaw tusa a bulad, atu sakatusa a mihcaan tu cacay a bulad itida i "Ludzidzini" wan-kuni labu nu papakatalanan a limulak. 4Mswati Ⅲ4 Sekuotu mihcaan a sepatay a bulad milimulak tu Mswati Ⅲpilecuhan, makakutay i sepatay a niyadu' malimulak, kya milihidanamin ku niyadu'ay a tademaw tu nina limulak. 8910""International Trade Fair duma nu Sekuoa mihcaan nu walu a bulad katukuh tu siwa a bulad sikawaw tu cacay a bataan a demiad asikawaw tu kitakitay a pisiwbayan (International Trade Fair, ), kya katinenga nu pasa putahay numisiwbaya, kya milihida ku katuuday nikasilacan tu cancanan masaup amalimulak, nuaydaay amihcaan mala Sekuoa tademawan tu mihmihcaan a kalimulakan a kawaw.. ,Royal Swazi Spa HotelLugogo Sun HotelMountain Inn niyaduay a angangan nu kalimulakan atu aidangan, Sekuoangangan nu tataydaan midang a liwkangan u Wancia taying hutinRoyal Swazi Spa Hotelidaw ku mammalian tu adidi'ay a sanglacay a mamalian, papakiwan atu ngangaduyan tu wuncin, "Lugogo Sun Hotel", sutu Muo-papena kitidaan idaw ku"Mountain Inn". Mbabane Club The Gables duma nu "Mbabane Club" adidi'ay a sasalamaan tu maliatu wunciucen, tabakiay a cacakayan nu The Gables idaw kunipatidengan tu Sekuonu aydaay a kakacuduan, angangan nu sapaadih u Amilikaa kacudu. mahedek ku nakamuan. Sekuolalimulakan caay ka yadah, labiihantu inayay ku kataydaan. HlaneMkhayaMlilwaneSwazi CandleNgwenya GlassMaguga Sekuoadidi' ku aaidangan, tada anganganan han u "Hlane", "Mkhaya" atu "Mlilwanea" tuluay kiya aadupan nu dadiputan a kitidaan atu nalimaan amisangaan tu lacik (Swazi Candle), galasuwan a kakulian (Ngwenya Glass), "Maguga" cascas sa.[5]
